column1: #text=Reading is very important to me , and with the amount that I read , it is economical to use a library to borrow the books I would like to read .
#text=When borrowing a book , I get my son into the car and we drive to the library .
#text=Usually we find a few books for him to borrow as well , so we go to the children 's section first and pick out two or three books for him .
#text=That way , when we go to find a book for me , he has something to entertain him .
#text=Then we go to the fiction section for adults .
#text=Usually my son Ryan will sit on the floor looking at his books next to me while I find book to check out .
#text=I find a book or two and then Ryan and I go to the check out and use my library card to check out the books .
#text=The librarian usually puts them in a bag and then we leave the library to go home and enjoy our books .
